title: Ivy League Universities
blurb: This month, the Internals Department presents information about the Ivy League universities (Princeton, Harvard, Yale, Columbia, Brown, Dartmouth, University of Pennsylvania, and Cornell). Learn all about what these top colleges are looking for, popular majors and minora, application details, and Stuyvesant-specific statistics!

title: September College Newsletter
